data.meta_description: Platinum Equity Capital Portable Principals, LLC is a Beverly Hills, CA based company incorporated on December 15, 2021. Discover contact details, principal and mailing addresses, incorporation details, filing and reporting history.
data.text:
Platinum Equity Capital Portable Principals, LLC is a business entity based in Beverly Hills, CA. Established recently on December 15, 2021, this Limited Liability Company is recognized under the document number 202135410772. Governed by the California Secretary of State, the company is listed in Active status in state records.

The principal and mailing address of the company is situated at C/o Platinum Equity Advisors, Llc, 360 North Crescent Drive, South Building, Beverly Hills, CA 90210. This address serves as the central hub for the company's activities and communications.

Overseeing the operations and compliance of this Limited Liability Company is C T Corporation System, who serves as the registered agent.
